argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mpteq2da.1 | |- F/ x ph |
| 2 |  | mpteq2da.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B = C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- A = A |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ax-gen | |- A. x A = A |
| 5 | 2 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> B = C ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B = C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mpteq12f | |- ( ( A. x A = A /\ A. x e. A B = C ) -> ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) |
